_sText:
..:: CENTRAL STATION

Created by Nathan "nay0r" | www.map-central.co.uk

Nav by Peter "Barndoor" Calvert 
http://www.tequilakawa.plus.com/ 

Apart of the Dimension Studios Network
http://www.dimensionstudios.org

In the year 1934 Central Station Bridge was
Reconstructed and widened after many years
In service between Liverpool and Manchester 
In 2005 the station was closed due to a new line 
Opening at Bank quay station, although after the closure
Terrorists ransacked one of the few remaining 
Trains and took control of the station and
Members of the public who were in the local area
What they donâ€™t know is a specialized squad has 
Been sent in. Also in a near by house they have
Hacked central stations CCTV cameras and have rigged
Up a monitor overlooking the station, although 
Connection is not 100% clear, it should aid in
Locating any suspects

Rescue points are located at central stations
Subway exit and outside near the northern petrol
Pumps, safely navigate hostages to the parked vans

Email: nayisdeath@hotmail.com

..:: Overview

Cs_central started out in March 2006, And ive
been on and off with the project, initally it was
meant to be a rebuild of an old 1.6 map known as
cs_intercept but after some thought I changed it 
into what is now known as cs_central.
It was meant to be a piece of art at first, it was a test
to see what i could do with the source engine, but after
constructing a major part of the bridge and station 
( which is based on a true place where i live )
I then decided to try and make it into something playable 
with reasonable frame rates.

The train bridge and passing road and the station itself are 
all based around the real place but the petrol station in real
life is just an old long distant car park looking over the town.

The beach area is a large outdoor area with a bus station,
When i started the project it was acutally the back of the shopping centre
which has recently recieved millions of pounds of rebuilding work 
to make it into a 21st century bus station

and the edge of the road in cs_central which points in the direction of the
old cottage near the petrol station runs to the rubgy stadium.

			..:: DETAILED MAP INFORMATION

: 	The map comes with LDR and HDR cubemaps compiled.
: 	Radar Overview.
: 	Highly Tuned Bot Navigation File.
: 	All Custom content is embedded into the BSP. ( 68.4mb )
: 	The map has a point_servercommand to allow servers to automatically
  	let users download the map.
:	The dynamic camera does seem to make users loose a fair bit of performance
	when running around, once it is destroyed it returns to normal
:	The Stations toilets can be entered, 
:	Overhead powerlines are Electrical So dont touch them when jumping 
	on top of the parked train.
:	Lightmaps are only Lower on the station, rest of the map are 
	generally higher than default.

			..:: Credits

Thanks to Valve, I used there Coke machine from de_nuke.
Plus The custom soundscape i used in cs_central is built around 
serveral of the official maps, including assault/port/office and train

			..:: Performance

I know the map is not amazing in terms of performance, This is 
because i didnt plan the map very well from the begining as explained above
but i believe it gets as good as it can for whats being rendered.
I spent various amounts of weeks hinting and using areaportals and window portals
to optimize the map, and using nodraw and func_detail.
